meanings.definition: A decorative stitch along the hem of fabric.
meanings.sent1: The hemstitch added a lovely touch to the tablecloth.
meanings.sent2: She carefully sewed a hemstitch on the edge of the napkin.
meanings.sent3: The hemstitch on the curtains made them look fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was like a hemstitch in the overall design.
meanings.sent5: The hemstitch stood out beautifully against the white fabric.

meanings.definition: To sew a hemstitch on fabric.
meanings.sent1: She will hemstitch the dress for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: I need to hemstitch this skirt before wearing it.
meanings.sent3: He tried to hemstitch the shirt but ended up with a crooked line.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in hemstitching was unmatched by anyone in the class.
meanings.sent5: The tailor hemstitched the collar with expertise and care.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a hemstitch.
meanings.sent1: Her favorite part of sewing was the hemstitch.
meanings.sent2: The hemstitching process requires patience and skill.
meanings.sent3: During the competition, the fastest task was the hemstitch.
meanings.sent4: The hemstitch was the final touch that completed the project.
meanings.sent5: The intricate hemstitch was a signature detail in her designs.
